content.question: The general view and detail show the Arch of Constantine.What was the intended meaning of the monument? Analyze how the reuse of sculptural fragments from other Roman works of art reinforces the intended meaning of the monument.

frqParts.text: The general view and detail show the Arch of Constantine.What was the intended meaning of the monument? Analyze how the reuse of sculptural fragments from other Roman works of art reinforces the intended meaning of the monument.

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
